text: To enjoy good health, to bring true happiness to one's family, to bring peace to all, one must first discipline and control one's own mind. If a man can control his mind he can find the way to Enlightenment, and all wisdom and virtue will naturally come to him.
author: Buddha

text: Christmas is not a time nor a season, but a state of mind. To cherish peace and goodwill, to be plenteous in mercy, is to have the real spirit of Christmas.
author: Calvin Coolidge

text: If there must be trouble, let it be in my day, that my child may have peace.
author: Thomas Paine

text: Do not overrate what you have received, nor envy others. He who envies others does not obtain peace of mind.
author: Buddha

text: Peace cannot be kept by force it can only be achieved by understanding.
author: Albert Einstein
